body.name: Herbal Essences Shampoo and Conditioner Set Repairing Argan Oil of Morocco with Natural Source Ingredients, Color Safe, BioRenew, 20.2 Fl Oz, 2 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 11 mins
features: You will receive one 20.2 fluid ounce bottles of Shampoo and one 20.2 fluid ounce bottle of Conditioner
REPAIR & SMOOTH HAIR: Our Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo is crafted to smooth and repair for beautiful hair
REAL BOTANICALS ENDORSED BY KEW: The real botanicals in this formula have been endorsed by the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew
THE SCENT EXPERIENCE: Multilayered scents of fizzy citrus, exotic spices & creamy vanilla
OUR NO, NO, NO LIST: Our Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo is paraben-free and colorant-free
COLOR-SAFE & pH-BALANCED: Our color-safe and pH-balanced shampoos/conditioners are crafted to be safe on color-treated hair
body.description: Repair damaged hair with Herbal Essences Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo and Conditioner. Our real botanicals are endorsed by Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, a leading expert on plants. This shampoo and conditioner, with real botanicals, smooths & soothes hair from root to tip. Crafted with our signature blend of real botanicals, Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo cleanses and helps repair for smooth, beautiful hair. This color-safe shampoo is pH-balanced, and gently cleanses while infusing notes of fizzy citrus, exotic spices and creamy vanilla into your hair—leaving it soft and smooth. Lather, rinse and repeat with ease knowing your shampoo is paraben free and dye free, and made with at least 90% natural-origin ingredients.* *Purified water and natural-source ingredient materials with limited processing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nourishment for Your Tresses
reviews.reviewText: Indulging my hair in the Herbal Essences Repairing Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set has been a revitalizing experience that transformed my daily hair care routine. Here's why this dynamic duo has become my go-to choice for achieving healthy, luscious locks:1. Luxurious Argan Oil Formula:The star ingredient, argan oil, is a game-changer for hair health, and Herbal Essences has captured its essence perfectly. The repairing formula enriched with argan oil not only cleanses but also deeply nourishes, leaving my hair feeling soft, silky, and rejuvenated.2. Irresistible Scent:The enchanting aroma of the Repairing Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner is a delightful blend that turns every shower into a sensory experience. The lingering fragrance is subtle yet invigorating, providing a refreshing start to my day and making the hair care routine a pleasure.3. Intensive Repair and Strengthening:For those with damaged or brittle hair, this set works wonders. The repairing properties of argan oil contribute to the restoration of hair strength and vitality. Over time, I've noticed a significant reduction in split ends, and my hair feels visibly healthier and more resilient.4. Silky Smooth Texture:The texture of my hair has undergone a remarkable transformation since incorporating Herbal Essences Repairing Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner into my routine. The duo imparts a silky smoothness that not only feels great but also adds a touch of elegance to my everyday look.5. Manageability and Shine:This set doesn't just clean and condition; it enhances manageability and imparts a natural shine. Brushing and styling become easier, and my hair looks radiant without any greasy residue. It strikes the perfect balance for those seeking both nourishment and aesthetic appeal.6. Affordable Luxury:Herbal Essences manages to deliver a luxurious experience without breaking the bank. The Repairing Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set offers an affordable solution for those who want to treat their hair to the best without compromising on quality.In conclusion, the Herbal Essences Repairing Argan Oil Shampoo and Conditioner Set is a true gem in the world of hair care. Its luxurious argan oil formula, enchanting scent, intensive repair, silky texture, manageability, and affordability make it a standout choice for anyone looking to pamper their locks. Elevate your hair care routine with Herbal Essences – where nourishment meets indulgence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing, leaves hair soft and shiny!
reviews.reviewText: My absolute favorite shampoo / conditioner. My hair is dyed and I get a Brazilian blowout once a year so I’m prone to hair damage and this has absolutely made my hair feel healthier and shinier. Every visitor I’ve had who’s tried my shampoo/conditioner has ended up asking me for the link so they could purchase it. The scent is also powerful at first but will last longer than any other product I’ve tried! 10/10 recommend for the quality and scent especially at this lower end price point.The one thing I don’t like about this product is the pump! When it’s almost empty, it gets very difficult to get the shampoo/ conditioner out but I guess that’s the case with all pump-type products. I ended up purchasing a separate bottle emptying kit that i replace the pump with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the expensive brands!
reviews.reviewText: So this is my first time using this brand. The best thing about it, the conditioner!! I'm used to putting conditioner on and fighting the dead hair out. If you have longer hair, you know what I'm talking about. That tangled mess you can't get your fingers through. I put on the conditioner, less than what I've used on expensive brands, and my fingers slid right through my hair! That's a first for me!! That alone will keep me using this! And I used LESS!! In this case, less is more! My new favorite! And no dead/split ends! Awesome stuff here!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My hair feels so healthy!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have loved herbal essences basically my whole life. I had recently switched to salon products, but due to cost constraint, ordered this on a whim. I absolutely love this set! My hair is so shiny and soft. It feels so healthy!!

reviews.reviewText: Love the smell, love the feel better. Works great!

reviews.reviewText: On a whim, I purchased this shampoo and conditioner just to switch things up after using high end salon products for years. Love the musky scent, the body it gave my thin hair. Really gave my hair the lift it needed

Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my scalp
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo and conditioner combo. I have used it for years. My hair dresser always comments on my hair looks so healthy. These larger size bottles make it great for a subscription product and I never run out. The price is wonderful too! I save so much yearly with tge subscriber and save!

These Herbal Essence shampoo and conditioner made with argan oil are perfect for someome like myself who has very dry brittle hair. This product is best used with the accompanying hair mask - for best results. This product tames the hair from so dry to soft and manageable. Even if you blow dry your hair, this product will allow you to have soft and supple hair every time. Highly recommend this product for such a terrific price!
Llevo poco tiempo probandolo, pero por ahora se me hace un muy buen producto, junto con todo el tratamiento me deja muy sedoso el cabello.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not sure if this is authentic
reviews.reviewText: Generally Ive had very good experience with Herbal essence but this one makes my hair very hard which hasnt happened before. so Im not sure if this is authentic Herbal essence.
Rend les cheveux doux soyeux avec un doux parfum

Mi cabello estaba hecho un caos; quebradizo, puntas abiertas, reseco... Una semana después de usar toda la línea (shampoo, acondicionador, mascarilla y crema para peinar) obtuve resultados impresionantes, cabe mencionar que durante esa semana no use calor en mi cabello. Muy recomendable - línea de aceite de argán y coco
